1#include "view_holder.h"
2#include <gui/view_i.h>

4#define TAG "ViewHolder"
5
6struct ViewHolder {
7 View* view;
8 ViewPort* view_port;
9 Gui* gui;
10
11 FreeCallback free_callback;
12 void* free_context;
13
14 BackCallback back_callback;
15 void* back_context;
16
17 uint8_t ongoing_input;
18};
19
20static void view_holder_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* context);
21static void view_holder_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context);
22
23ViewHolder* view_holder_alloc() {
24 ViewHolder* view_holder = malloc(sizeof(ViewHolder));
25
26 view_holder->view_port = view_port_alloc();
27 view_port_draw_callback_set(view_holder->view_port, view_holder_draw_callback, view_holder);
28 view_port_input_callback_set(view_holder->view_port, view_holder_input_callback, view_holder);
29 view_port_enabled_set(view_holder->view_port, false);
30
31 return view_holder;
32}
33
34void view_holder_free(ViewHolder* view_holder) {
35 furi_assert(view_holder);
36
37 if(view_holder->gui) {
38 gui_remove_view_port(view_holder->gui, view_holder->view_port);
39 }
40
41 view_port_free(view_holder->view_port);
42
43 if(view_holder->free_callback) {
44 view_holder->free_callback(view_holder->free_context);
45 }
46
47 free(view_holder);
48}
49
50void view_holder_set_view(ViewHolder* view_holder, View* view) {
51 furi_assert(view_holder);
52 if(view_holder->view) {
53 if(view_holder->view->exit_callback) {
54 view_holder->view->exit_callback(view_holder->view->context);
55 }
56
57 view_set_update_callback(view_holder->view, NULL);
58 view_set_update_callback_context(view_holder->view, NULL);
59 }
60
61 view_holder->view = view;
62
63 if(view_holder->view) {
64 view_set_update_callback(view_holder->view, view_holder_update);
65 view_set_update_callback_context(view_holder->view, view_holder);
66
67 if(view_holder->view->enter_callback) {
68 view_holder->view->enter_callback(view_holder->view->context);
69 }
70 }
71}
72
73void view_holder_set_free_callback(
74 ViewHolder* view_holder,
75 FreeCallback free_callback,
76 void* free_context) {
77 furi_assert(view_holder);
78 view_holder->free_callback = free_callback;
79 view_holder->free_context = free_context;
80}
81
82void* view_holder_get_free_context(ViewHolder* view_holder) {
83 return view_holder->free_context;
84}
85
86void view_holder_set_back_callback(
87 ViewHolder* view_holder,
88 BackCallback back_callback,
89 void* back_context) {
90 furi_assert(view_holder);
91 view_holder->back_callback = back_callback;
92 view_holder->back_context = back_context;
93}
94
95void view_holder_attach_to_gui(ViewHolder* view_holder, Gui* gui) {
96 furi_assert(gui);
97 furi_assert(view_holder);
98 view_holder->gui = gui;
99 gui_add_view_port(gui, view_holder->view_port, GuiLayerFullscreen);
100}
101
102void view_holder_start(ViewHolder* view_holder) {
103 view_port_enabled_set(view_holder->view_port, true);
104}
105
106void view_holder_stop(ViewHolder* view_holder) {
107 while(view_holder->ongoing_input) furi_delay_tick(1);
108 view_port_enabled_set(view_holder->view_port, false);
109}
110
111void view_holder_update(View* view, void* context) {
112 furi_assert(view);
113 furi_assert(context);
114
115 ViewHolder* view_holder = context;
116 if(view == view_holder->view) {
117 view_port_update(view_holder->view_port);
118 }
119}
120
121static void view_holder_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* context) {
122 ViewHolder* view_holder = context;
123 if(view_holder->view) {
124 view_draw(view_holder->view, canvas);
125 }
126}
127
128static void view_holder_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
129 ViewHolder* view_holder = context;
130
131 uint8_t key_bit = (1 << event->key);
132 if(event->type == InputTypePress) {
133 view_holder->ongoing_input |= key_bit;
134 } else if(event->type == InputTypeRelease) {
135 view_holder->ongoing_input &= ~key_bit;
136 } else if(!(view_holder->ongoing_input & key_bit)) {
137 FURI_LOG_W(
138 TAG,
139 "non-complementary input, discarding key: %s, type: %s",
140 input_get_key_name(event->key),
141 input_get_type_name(event->type));
142 return;
143 }
144
145 bool is_consumed = false;
146
147 if(view_holder->view) {
148 is_consumed = view_input(view_holder->view, event);
149 }
150
151 if(!is_consumed && event->type == InputTypeShort) {
152 if(event->key == InputKeyBack) {
153 if(view_holder->back_callback) {
154 view_holder->back_callback(view_holder->back_context);
155 }
156 }
157 }
158}
